info.title: MRP Change Request Reason â€“ Read
info.description: This synchronous inbound service enables external systems to read the reason codes for change requests that are currently configured, along with their descriptions. Change request reasons can be assigned to change requests to give additional information about why a change request was created. This service supports only the GET operation.

x-sap-shortText: Read change request reasons using this synchronous inbound service

values.text: [MRP Change Request Integration with SAP Business Network(65D)](https://me.sap.com/processnavigator/SolP/65D " Link To BP ")

post.description:
Group multiple requests into a single request payload, see [Batch Requests](http://docs.oasis-open.org/odata/odata/v4.01/odata-v4.01-part1-protocol.html#sec_BatchRequests).

*Please note that "Try it out" is not supported for this request.*
